cards.name: Vim

relics.name: Aerogel
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. Whenever you shuffle your draw pile with this card in it, it will end up on top.
relics.flavorText: Weighs next to nothing, and makes a great insulator against bad luck.

relics.name: Aluminium Foil
relics.description: Card rewards tend to be Upgraded and of a higher rarity.
relics.flavorText: Maybe if you put this on all your cards, people would respect you.

relics.name: Boomerang
relics.description: Put the fourth card you play each turn on top of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: If you love something, let it go. Or just frickin' chuck it.

relics.name: Buckler
relics.description: The next 2 times you play an upgradeable card that's in your deck, Upgrade it permanently.
relics.flavorText: Emblazoned with the famed cygnet signet of Merek.

relics.name: Crucible
relics.description: Whenever you remove an Upgraded card from your deck, Upgrade 2 random cards in your deck.
relics.flavorText: As long as it can handle temps up to 451°F, it should do the job.

relics.name: Crutches
relics.description: Whenever you get a Status, enemies lose 1 Strength during their next turn.
relics.flavorText: You're not the one that's gonna need these.

relics.name: Elizabethan Collar
relics.description: Upon pickup, your Curses become Injuries. All Curses you obtain become Injuries.
relics.flavorText: If you'd just stop messing with it—!

relics.name: Expired Coupon
relics.description: When you reach 70 or more total unblocked damage dealt in a combat, deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Good for 10% off an "ass-beating." Who printed this thing, anyway?

relics.name: Ferry Pass
relics.description: The next time you play every unique playable card in your deck in one combat, add a Rare relic to that combat's reward.
relics.flavorText: It reads, "Enjoy your trip to Lastcel Isle!"

relics.name: Ivory Trinket
relics.description: Every 5th time you Retain a Miracle, add a Miracle into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Someone cut the tusk from an elephant, just to whittle it into a smaller tusk. But why?

relics.name: Knoch
relics.description: Enemies with 25% or less health are Weak.
relics.flavorText: It keeps sinking to the bottom of your pack.

relics.name: Party Balloon
relics.description: Power cards start each combat in the top half of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Once you pop, the fun immediately stops.

relics.name: Porcupine Quills
relics.description: Whenever you receive 12 or more unblocked damage, deal that much damage back.
relics.flavorText: If these get ya, you must have really deserved it.

relics.name: Promissory Notes
relics.description: Whenever you receive a debuff from an enemy, your first Attack against that enemy next turn deals 5 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: An ancient instrument of subterfuge.

relics.name: Radioactive Pellet
relics.description: Poison doesn't decrement.
relics.flavorText: The secret weapon of the world's most dastardly villains.

relics.name: Rose-Tinted Glasses
relics.description: The first 2 times you draw a Status each combat, Exhaust it and draw a card.
relics.flavorText: You know what? Things aren't so bad.

relics.name: Rosewood Lute
relics.description: Whenever you block damage exactly, gain [E] next turn.
relics.flavorText: Anyway, here's "Wonderspire."

relics.name: Sharkskin Sheath
relics.description: Whenever you end your turn with no cards in hand, draw a card next turn.
relics.flavorText: If only you had a sharkskin knife to put in it.

relics.name: Silk Glove
relics.description: Whenever you would discard a single card at the end of your turn, Retain it.
relics.flavorText: Left behind by a fancy lady who doesn't mess around.

relics.name: Spinner
relics.description: Whenever you play a card of a different type than the previous that turn, gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: Please don't land on red, please don't land on red... son of a—!

relics.name: Stiletto
relics.description: Enemies gain 50% less Block.
relics.flavorText: Designed to slip between the plates and links of most any armor.

relics.name: Stimpack
relics.description: The first time your HP drops to 50% or below each combat, your Attacks deal double damage for 1 turn.
relics.flavorText: The dogtags bear the initials "T.O.P."

relics.name: Tattered Rug
relics.description: You can sell potions to the Merchant.
relics.flavorText: What, you think anyone can just set up shop?

relics.name: Thumb Drive
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Data.
relics.flavorText: Who's got three thumbs and a backup copy of the ancient Internet? This AI.

relics.name: Training Wheel
relics.description: Whenever you draw a hand with no Attacks or no Skills, put a random card of that type from your draw pile into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Its exterior is pristine, but it's so rusted on the inside that it can barely turn.

relics.name: Tuning Fork
relics.description: Whenever you break an enemy's Block exactly, deal 10 damage to it.
relics.flavorText: If you try eating with it, you're liable to break a tooth.

relics.name: Weak Tea
relics.description: The first 2 Colorless cards you play each combat cost 1 less.
relics.flavorText: If you can sleep after drinking it, what's the point?

relics.name: Ball Bearing
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, shuffle in a Flash of Steel or Finesse, chosen randomly.
relics.flavorText: Keeps things running smooth.

relics.name: Bellows
relics.description: Every 5 times you Exhaust a card, shuffle a card from your exhaust pile into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Boy, if this were bigger than an inch across, it could really come in handy.

relics.name: Blood Sugar
relics.description: Whenever you enter a room, heal 7 HP, then decrease that number by 1. Rest to reset it to 7.
relics.flavorText: You know you shouldn't, but you just can't help yourself!

relics.name: Boiling Flask
relics.description: At the start of each combat, if your potion slots are full, choose a Vapor card and add it into your hand.
relics.flavorText: A round-bottom boiling flask, five thousand milliliters!

relics.name: Feather Duster
relics.description: Upon pickup, remove any number of cards from your deck except Strike, Defend, and Curse cards.
relics.flavorText: "My life's mistakes, they lay about me like so much dust." - Cademo

relics.name: Firecrackers
relics.description: Overkill damage is dealt to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Makes quite a racket. Keep it down out there, y'dang kids!

relics.name: Gummy Vitamins
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate.
Once per turn, you may draw a card, then shuffle a Slimed into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Mmm, chewy!

relics.name: Hardlight
relics.description: When your HP falls to 10 or less for the first time, permanently gain 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: The words "DO NOT FOLLOW" have been scratched under the brim.

relics.name: Hot Poker
relics.description: Whenever you draw a card during your turn, deal damage equal to its cost to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Wouldn't want to be caught at the business end of this thing.

relics.name: Ice Cube Tray
relics.description: For every 4 cards you add to your deck, you may remove a card from your deck.
relics.flavorText: Everyone who knew how to use this thing died a long time ago.

relics.name: Iridium Chain
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power card, put an Ethereal copy into your hand that costs 1 more.
relics.flavorText: You try to count the links, but never come up with the same number twice.

relics.name: Jackalope Antler
relics.description: Whenever an enemy dies, refund the Energy cost of the last card you played.
relics.flavorText: Whatever creature this came from must be running around lopsided.

relics.name: Lead Dart
relics.description: The first time each combat you have 10 cards in hand, gain 3 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Form over function? Function over form? "How about neither?" it seems to ask.

relics.name: Love-Emitting Diode
relics.description: Positive Focus affects your rightmost Orb 3 times.
relics.flavorText: Spread the love, pursuant to the principles of the inverse-square law.

relics.name: Medicine Ball
relics.description: You have additional Strength equal to the highest Strength among enemies (0 minimum).
relics.flavorText: If only you had someone to toss this around with...

relics.name: Mudwin's Cradle
relics.description: Entering Divinity requires 3 less Mantra.
relics.flavorText: Most popular desk toy.

relics.name: New Friend
relics.description: Strikes and Defends Exhaust 50% of the time.
relics.flavorText: This little guy won't stop following you... and boy is he hungry.

relics.name: Paper Snowflake
relics.description: The newest card in your deck that costs 1 or more costs 1 less.
relics.flavorText: Is this what this is supposed to look like?

relics.name: Peacock Shield
relics.description: Whenever you enter Wrath, double your Block.
relics.flavorText: Presents a remarkable defense.

relics.name: Plasma Lobster
relics.description: Increases your attack damage by 2 while you have Block.
relics.flavorText: Smells of petrichor.

relics.name: Prayer Box
relics.description: You keep your Mantra between combats.
relics.flavorText: It's the perfect shape to hold your square prayers.

relics.name: Princely Helmet
relics.description: Double the first X Block you gain each combat, where X is 8 times the current Act.
relics.flavorText: Way too small to fit on your head. If it were Ours, We'd make it much bigger.

relics.name: Purple-Tinged Leaf
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose an Attack. Whenever you play this card, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: This leaf has the appearance, unique in all the plant kingdom, of having been drawn by a grade schooler.

relics.name: Quartz Cube
relics.description: At the start of each combat with 3 or more enemies, apply 2 Stunned and 2 Invincible to one.
relics.flavorText: It's like an ice cube that never melts, but also isn't cold.

relics.name: Runic Remote
relics.description: Whenever you win a combat without taking damage, you may add a card corresponding to a defeated enemy into your deck.
relics.flavorText: Take hold of your destiny.

relics.name: Sculpting Steel
relics.description: Upon pickup, becomes a copy of a random Common, Uncommon, Rare, or Shop relic you already have.
relics.flavorText: Malleable as clay one second, hard as stone the next.

relics.name: Short Fuse
relics.description: Your Lightning Orbs target the enemy with the least HP.
relics.flavorText: It might blow at any moment.

relics.name: Sideboard
relics.description: Chosen card rewards go into a separate pile. You can move cards from that pile to your deck between combats.
relics.flavorText: A board for you to keep cards... on? In?

relics.name: Sod
relics.description: Put an Upgraded copy of every 8th unupgraded card you play into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Contrary to popular belief, it's not greener on the other side. It's brown.

relics.name: Spire of Hannoy
relics.description: Weak and Vulnerable are 10% more effective against enemies for every stack past the 1st (max 30%).
relics.flavorText: This puzzle's namesake Spire must have been even deadlier and more perplexing than this one.

relics.name: Splatula
relics.description: Whenever you Attack an enemy for half or more of its Max HP, set its HP to 0.
relics.flavorText: Features a nonstick coating for easy cleanup.

relics.name: Tank Top
relics.description: Whenever you Attack the enemy with the most HP, if there are 2 or more enemies, deal 3 damage to the front enemy.
relics.flavorText: The rusted remnant of a once-great warrior tribe.

relics.name: Thinking Cap
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw the second-to-last card you played last combat. (Only cards in your deck count.)
relics.flavorText: With this big ol' cone on your head, everyone can see how smart you are.

relics.name: Toy Rocket
relics.description: The first time you play a cost 3, cost 2, and cost 1 card in a row each combat, add a powerful cost 0 Attack into your hand.
relics.flavorText: We choose to go to the Spire.

relics.name: Traffic Cone
relics.description: The first time an enemy does something other than attack, it loses 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: In the dark of the Spire, its glinting stripes attain an unlikely menace.

relics.name: Trident Head
relics.description: The first card you play on a single enemy each combat is copied to all other enemies.
relics.flavorText: A part of the weapon wielded by the fabled Wave King.

relics.name: Underdog Bone
relics.description: Whenever you play an unupgraded card, if there's an Upgraded copy in your draw pile, put it into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Someone must have been a very good boy or girl.

relics.name: Vitrine
relics.description:
Upon pickup, remove a card from your deck. You may shuffle it into your draw pile anytime during your turn.
Right click to activate.
relics.flavorText: The perfect place to present your most prized possessions.

relics.name: Witchy Dice
relics.description: At the start of each combat, play a random card of any color.
relics.flavorText: What a lucky find! #blessed

relics.name: Conveyor
relics.description: At the start of your turn, Channel a type of Orb of which you have 3 or more Channeled.
relics.flavorText: Takes you where you want to go.

relics.name: Dhvaja
relics.description: Whenever you enter Divinity, Divinity's damage multiplier increases by 1 this combat.
relics.flavorText: Victory shall be yours... eventually.

relics.name: EXA
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if you have no Lightning, Frost, and/or Dark Orbs Channeled, Channel an Orb of a random missing type.
relics.flavorText: Only your superhuman eyesight allows you to see this nanoscopic machine.

relics.name: Fishing Reel
relics.description: Each turn, you can pay for 1 card with next turn's Energy.
relics.flavorText: There's always the next sucker.

relics.name: Kill Pill
relics.description: The first time you apply Poison to each enemy each turn, it triggers immediately.
relics.flavorText: Would look pretty cool on the back of a leather jacket.

relics.name: Knife Block
relics.description: Whenever you create Shivs, create an additional one.
relics.flavorText: "Who could ever need this many knives?" asked the world's stupidest person.

relics.name: Ouija Board
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate.
Once per turn, pay the cost of a card in your discard pile plus 1 to play it and shuffle it into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Only as mysterious as you make it.

relics.name: Pushpin
relics.description: The cards in your opening hand Retain for the rest of combat.
relics.flavorText: Sometimes used to solve murders, but the most skilled assassins can use them to commit one.

relics.name: Sheep's Eye Marble
relics.description: Whenever you play two copies of the same card in a row, play it again.
relics.flavorText: You feel dumber just looking at it.

relics.name: Twin Pearls
relics.description: You start each turn with Pearlescence in your hand.
relics.flavorText: They are completely identical in every way, impossible to tell apart. Close enough, anyway.

relics.name: The Holy Grail
relics.description: The first time you would die each combat, die next turn instead.
relics.flavorText: You have chosen... wisely.

relics.name: Big Hammer
relics.description: You may upgrade Red cards a second time. Upon pickup, Upgrade an Upgraded card.
relics.flavorText: Truly, it is the biggest hammer you have ever seen.

relics.name: Craggleroot
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. The first card you draw each turn costs 1 more this combat.
relics.flavorText: This root has seen some hard times. Maybe it will see you through hard times as well?

relics.name: Ember
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Take 2 damage for each Energy beyond the third you spend each turn.
relics.flavorText: Hachi machi, that's hot!

relics.name: Free Samples
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever an enemy deals unblocked attack damage to you, it gains 1 Intangible if it's not already.
relics.flavorText: Everyone's going to want a piece.

relics.name: Kinked Spring
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Your discard pile only shuffles into your draw pile when you end your turn with an empty draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Someone overwound this thing, and it ain't comin' back.

relics.name: Rabbit Ears
relics.description: You may upgrade Blue cards a second time. Upon pickup, Upgrade an Upgraded card.
relics.flavorText: "You're listening to 98.7 FM: The Fever. Don't touch that dial!"

relics.name: Red Cape
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you Attack a single enemy, other enemies can't be targeted until it dies.
relics.flavorText: Who wants the horns?

relics.name: Red Paperclip
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Replaces 2 random Common or Uncommon relics.
relics.flavorText: A powerful symbol of barter.

relics.name: Rustam's Pendant
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Has a different drawback for each character.
relics.flavorText: It's just a hunk of metal, but it seems to know something about you.

relics.name: Short Straw
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and choose a random card in your hand. If it's still in your hand at the end of the turn, you lose 10 HP.
relics.flavorText: This may not have been the pick.

relics.name: Skeleton Key
relics.description: You may upgrade Green cards a second time. Upon pickup, Upgrade an Upgraded card.
relics.flavorText: What does it unlock? You.

relics.name: Solitaire
relics.description: You may upgrade Purple cards a second time. Upon pickup, Upgrade an Upgraded card.
relics.flavorText: You dreamed of it, once. How it crossed over into reality is a mystery.

relics.name: Third Arm
relics.description: Start each combat with a cost 0 Power in your draw pile that gives you [E] every turn.
relics.flavorText: It's tiny, and it doesn't even have fingers.

relics.name: Writ of Mandamus
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, you lose 5 Block.
relics.flavorText: It begins, "Whatever you're thinking about doing: hold it, mister."

relics.name: Bookmark
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw an extra card for each Innate card in your deck.
relics.flavorText: "Now, where was I..."

relics.name: Bouncer
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. It becomes Unplayable. If it's discarded from your hand, play it.
relics.flavorText: I hope you have a plan for the landing.

relics.name: Broken Clock
relics.description: Each combat starts with two player turns, then two enemy turns.
relics.flavorText: This one is only wrong twice a day, somehow, and right the rest of the time.

relics.name: Citrus Reamer
relics.description: The first time each turn you have 10 cards in hand, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Why squeeze when you can ream?

relics.name: Crusader's Map
relics.description: Points the way to a fabled font of immortality.
relics.flavorText: Search for the truth.

relics.name: Finger Trap
relics.description: You can't lose HP during your turn.
relics.flavorText: Maybe if you chilled out for a second, you could get it off.

relics.name: Oven Mitt
relics.description: Prevent the next 6 times you would lose HP.
relics.flavorText: It's already starting to fall apart.

relics.name: Rattle Coin
relics.description: Double the first unblocked attack damage dealt to you and ALL enemies each combat.
relics.flavorText: Both sides depict the same strangely familiar creature.

relics.name: Soularoid
relics.description: Whenever you play a non-Status card with a different name than any card in your deck, add a copy of it to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Those guys with the beards were right...?!

relics.name: Tam-Tam
relics.description: Whenever you start your turn with Block, you and ALL enemies gain 1 Strength.
